data.title: Career Opportunities
data.text:
Albert Einstein College of Medicine is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, or protected veteran or disabled status. We seek candidates whose skills, and personal and professional experience, have prepared them to contribute to our commitment to diversity and excellence. EEO is the law.

Albert Einstein College of Medicine is committed to prohibiting discrimination against employees and job applicants with disabilities. It is Einstein's policy to endeavor to provide reasonable accommodations to qualified individuals with disabilities who can perform the essential functions of the position they are applying to. To request a reasonable accommodation, please email the human resources talent acquisition office at careers@einsteinmed.edu. The vice president for human resources will process all requests and, where appropriate, provide reasonable accommodations in a prompt, fair and efficient manner.
